member.name: T:HTIRSeeker
member.summary: Before use this module, Please import first: import "Sensors\HTIRSeeker" The HiTechnic IRSeeker V2 Sensor module made by OFDL Taiwan.

member.name: M:getRawDC
member.summary: Get DC mode IRSeeker raw values.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getRawAC
member.summary: Get AC mode IRSeeker raw values.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:Config
member.summary: Config each channel strength offset and direction filter.
member.param: Direction lower bound to apply the filter.
Direction upper bound to apply the filter.

member.name: M:getFilterAC_DirSth
member.summary: Get AC mode IRSeeker filtered Direction and Strength value. *To use this function, please run HTIRSeeker.Config(..) method first!
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getFilterAC_All
member.summary: Get AC mode IRSeeker all filtered values. *To use this function, please run HTIRSeeker.Config(..) method first!
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:set600Hz
member.summary: Set HiTechnic IRSeeker V2 to 600Hz mode.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:set1200Hz
member.summary: Set HiTechnic IRSeeker V2 to 1200Hz mode. *WRO and RCJ usually using 1200Hz (D mode).
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.
